Description_lang: Your dragon scales increase your armor by $s1%.

description_blz.en_US: Your dragon scales increase your armor by 75%.
description_blz.es_MX: Tus escamas de dragón aumentan un 75% tu armadura.
description_blz.pt_BR: Suas escamas de dragão aumentam em 75% a sua armadura.
description_blz.de_DE: Eure Drachenschuppen erhöhen Eure Rüstung um 75%.
description_blz.en_GB: Your dragon scales increase your armor by 75%.
description_blz.es_ES: Las escamas de dragón aumentan un 75% tu armadura.
description_blz.fr_FR: Vos écailles draconiques augmentent votre Armure de 75%.
description_blz.it_IT: Le scaglie del drago aumentano l'armatura del 75%.
description_blz.ru_RU: Ваша драконья чешуя усиливает броню на 75%.
description_blz.ko_KR: 육체를 덮은 용의 비늘이 방어도를 75%만큼 증가시킵니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 你的龍鱗使你的護甲值提高75%。
description_blz.zh_CN: 你的龙鳞使你的护甲提高75%。
